body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one):
BUG

Create/delete rolebinding kube-aggregator:authentication-reader in different namespace cause to the failure
detail: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/kube-aggregator/hack/local-up-kube-aggregator.sh#L63-L64

```
[root@dhcp-140-98 kube-aggregator]# hack/local-up-kube-aggregator.sh 
Generating a 2048 bit RSA private key
......+++
.......+++
writing new private key to '/var/run/kubernetes/aggregator/etcd-ca.key'
-----
2017/04/07 21:55:39 [INFO] generate received request
2017/04/07 21:55:39 [INFO] received CSR
2017/04/07 21:55:39 [INFO] generating key: rsa-2048
2017/04/07 21:55:40 [INFO] encoded CSR
2017/04/07 21:55:40 [INFO] signed certificate with serial number 662404771430426638937972147892418310320464010231
2017/04/07 21:55:40 [WARNING] This certificate lacks a "hosts" field. This makes it unsuitable for
websites. For more information see the Baseline Requirements for the Issuance and Management
of Publicly-Trusted Certificates, v.1.1.6, from the CA/Browser Forum (https://cabforum.org);
specifically, section 10.2.3 ("Information Requirements").
2017/04/07 21:55:40 [INFO] generate received request
2017/04/07 21:55:40 [INFO] received CSR
2017/04/07 21:55:40 [INFO] generating key: rsa-2048
2017/04/07 21:55:40 [INFO] encoded CSR
2017/04/07 21:55:40 [INFO] signed certificate with serial number 461618477973698471549265686319582552431442450585
Error from server (AlreadyExists): namespaces "kube-public" already exists
clusterrolebinding "kube-aggregator:system:auth-delegator" created
clusterrolebinding "kube-aggregator:system:kube-aggregator" created
Error from server (AlreadyExists): rolebindings.rbac.authorization.k8s.io "kube-aggregator:authentication-reader" already exists
!!! [0407 21:55:41] Call tree:
!!! [0407 21:55:41]  1: hack/local-up-kube-aggregator.sh:91 start_kube-aggregator(...)
!!! Error in hack/local-up-kube-aggregator.sh:64
  Error in hack/local-up-kube-aggregator.sh:64. '((i<3-1))' exited with status 1
Call stack:
  1: hack/local-up-kube-aggregator.sh:64 start_kube-aggregator(...)
  2: hack/local-up-kube-aggregator.sh:91 main(...)
Exiting with status 1
```
title: [kube-aggregator] local-up-kube-aggregator.sh failure
